en: Enables control of goods transfer and service vehicle coverage.
Select this to enable restrictions for this building.  If this is not selected
column3: no other settings will take effect.

en: Enable to ensure that the building can always service the same district and/or area that it's in
column3: even if the district or area later changes

en: Permit this building to import from outside connections.
Permit this building to export to outside connections.
This means that the mod is not able to operate
Transfer Controller was unable to complete its required Harmony patches.
Possible causes of this problem include:
The required Harmony 2 mod dependency was not installed
An old and/or broken mod is preventing Harmony 2 from operating properly
Transfer Controller detected a conflict with at least one other mod.
These mods must be removed before Transfer Controller can operate.
